name: Dungeon Warrior
description:
DUNGEON WARRIOR!!! DUNGEON WARRIOR!!! DUNGEON WARRIOR!!! DUNGEON WARRIOR!!!

Dungeon Warrior is an old skool 8-bit RPG game made with RPG Maker 2003 and Campotech's first RPG to be released here. You create a party consisting of a Fighter, A Magic-User, and a Cleric. The three of you travel in a vast world where you must seek out the four crystals of Earth, Fire, Water and Air and bring them to the king of Torianna so he can open a gateway to the evil Dungeon Master where you must defeat the evil Dungeon Master and bring peace to the world.  There are many places to explore and 30 monsters to fight. Learn spells by buying books at the magic shops. There are many side-quest to complete such as the most hardest one we can think of......THE FOREST MAZE IN THE AIR KINGDOM!!!! There are also puzzles to solve including the most difficult one we can create....THE ? Mountain.. Can you solve it?

Dungeon Warrior uses turn-based battle system and all the character and monster stats were determined by d6 rolls. The same goes to spell effects and weapon stats.
